summary: SUDDEN UNEXPECTED ACCELERATION WHILE DRIVING.  EVEN PULLING INTO THE DRIVEWAY WITH FOOT ON THE BRAKE THE ENGINE REVS UP OR SAME PROBLEM WHILE SITTING AT A STOPLIGHT.  IT'S AS THOUGH THE CAR DOES NOT WANT TO STOP.  AT TIMES IF YOU SHIFT DOWN AND LET OFF ON THE GAS THE CAR GOES FOR A SHORT STRETCH WITHOUT SLOWING DOWN.  *TR
